item.description:
40+ Singles Dance Saturday, June 7, from 7:30 ? 12at Temple Ohabei Shalom, 1187 Beacon St., Brookline, MAAll 40+ singles are welcome to attend. Over 100 singles expected! Dress to impress!

Rock 'n roll & twist the night away with DJ Rob Peters, playing music from Sinatra to the present. Please bring your own alcoholic beverages and save. No alcohol will be sold. Soft drinks will be available. There will be a free raffle and complimentary desserts, coffee & tea. Cost: $15 if payment received by 5/30 or $20 at the door. For advance payment, here are your options: 1. Pay by check: Payable to Date Me I?m Jewish and send with your name, phone & email address to Date Me I?m Jewish, PO Box 82, Brockton, MA 02302-0082. *2. Pay via PayPal . Go to your PayPal account. Our payment email address is datemeimjewish@hotmail.com. Notice there?s no ? (apostrophe) in our email name. Please print and bring your receipt. * * Payment policy: All sales are final and no refunds or credits can be given unless we cancel the event. We accept MC, VS, AMEX, and Discover only through PayPal. By making your reservation you agree to our payment policy. Cash only at the door, please. Join Date Me I?m Jewish today. It?s FREE and easy! Go to www.datemeimjewish.com Questions? Email datemeimjewish@hotmail.com or call Barry at 508-333-1466 or Stan at 508-572-9049 Reserve now and save!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.name: Singles Dance
